subject: calibration
description_text: when I calibrate and go into gear 1, 1 and 2 shift. when I go into gear 2, 2 and 4 shift. when I go to gear 3, 1 3 5 shift. here's a video. is there an issue with my calibration or alignment???

conversations.body_text: Hi Hassan Majid,  You just need to shift through all gears once to complete the calibration, and then everything should work properly.

Hi,

Ive tried this, never worked. Its not calibrating at all, I went into the
game and tried calibrating there too and same issue.

On Fri, Jan 9, 2026 at 9:46 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi Hassan Majid,  Please click Revert, then click Save, and try recalibrating again.

tried this and still not working

On Fri, Jan 9, 2026, 11:52 PM support@simsonn.com

Hi Hassan Majid,  Please try a manual firmware update: Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → H Gear → firmware → hgear-hspro.sfu. After the update is complete, please recalibrate the device.

I removed one of the washers and not sure if that was the problem and its
working fine now

thank you for your help!

On Sat, Jan 10, 2026, 12:22 AM support@simsonn.com
